product_name: Mountain Hardwear Capacitor Rain Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Ultralight, ultra-breathable and waterproof, the men's Mountain Hardwear Capacitor Rain Jacket quickly disperses sweat, even without pit zips, so you stay dry on the inside when you're working hard. Dry.Q(TM) EVAP technology accelerates evaporation for more breathability and comfort during your aerobic activities. Nylon 2.5-layer shell is waterproof, windproof and incredibly lightweight, so you can pack it easily. Fully adjustable hood has single-pull adjustment system. Cuff tabs and hem drawcords offer quick fit adjustments. The men's Mountain Hardwear Capacitor Rain Jacket features zippered hand pockets and an internal zippered pocket for keys, ID and other small items. Closeout.
